section.title: Import example project
section.para:
Download the zip file from http://www.vogella.com/download/androidtest/countries.zip and import the Android project from into your workspace via the
File Import... General Existing Projects into Workspace
menu path.

section.title: Debug the creation of the list items
section.para: After launching the application you suppose to see a list of countries registered in the system. There is a bug in the implementation which causes the list to show empty strings.

listitem.para: Realizing that their is a problem, you switch Debug mode on in the DDMS perspective.
Put a breakpoint in MainActivity.onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) and re-launch the activity.
Execute CountryUtils.getCountries() statement and check the value of "countries" variable. If you believe the value is incorrect, use "Step into" debug function to find the issue.
Launch the application and make sure the list of countries is shown correctly.

section.title: Debug list item click behavior
section.para: If you click an item in the list, application will show a toast message with the name of the country clicked. There is a bug in the applications which makes this function not working properly.

listitem.para: (Try to) debug MainActivity.onListItemClick() method and fix the issue.
Launch the application and make sure correct item is show in the toast.
